1.title: Justice Has Been Served

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Aubrey deals with two irate mothers; Arica investigates a possible meth lab; Virginia responds to a stolen car call where the suspect flees, leaving his three young children behind; Joy arrests a man in a case of domestic drama.

2.title: A 50,000 Volt Mistake

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: An unruly bystander refuses to cooperate with Andrea. Shelunda investigates a suspicious man in a pirate costume. Erika tries to reach a troubled prostitute before it's too late. Julie investigates a molestation case involving a teenage girl.

3.title: Girl Cops Rule!

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Lindsey breaks up a suspected porn shoot; an eccentric character tries to lecture Amie on the effects of marijuana; Deb arrests a bratty teenager; and Kelly chases down a hit-and-run driver.

4.title: A Surprise Party with Guns!

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Andrea chases down a mouthy suspect in an elaborate drug bust. Shelunda gets called to a wacky drunken dispute. Erika pulls over a vehicle suspected of drug activity. Julie participates in a sting to bust fraudulent contractors.

5.title: Best Mom Out Here

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Andrea participates in a drug sting that gets complicated when two suspected dealers show up at the same time. Shelunda intervenes in a wacky dispute. Julie attempts to get to the bottom of a juvenile case. Erika tries to talk some sense into a girl.

6.title: Early Bird Gets the Worm

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Andrea chases down a fleeing suspect who leads her team straight to a fully stocked drug house. Erika engages in a traffic stop that leads to a very queasy suspect. Shelunda witnesses a case of road rage. Julie goes undercover as an Internet escort.

7.title: Your Hair Take It Off

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Deb negotiates with a suicidal man, barricaded inside his home; Lindsey has an amusing exchange with an enraged citizen; Amie helps a pregnant lady get to the hospital; and Kelly busts a colorful ex-stripper wanted on a shoplifting warrant.

8.title: You're My Kind of Woman

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Deb investigates a bloody motel shooting; Amie is forced to remove a cognitively impaired teenager from his foster home; Lindsey takes down a gang member; and Kelly hunts down a slick deadbeat dad who tries to escape.

9.title: These Are Not Cookies

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Andrea takes down a suspected prescription pill dealer. Shelunda encounters a trio of drunken revelers. Erika trades in her badge for a pair of short-shorts and goes undercover as a prostitute. Julie searches for the truth behind an alleged rape case.

10.title: Tore Up from the Floor Up

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: Mandy rushes to a possible DUI accident where officers tase the suspected drunk driver; Colleen has to draw her weapon in the course of taking down a prostitution and drug haven; Rose responds to a shooting; Tia intercedes during a heated dispute.

11.title: We Got a Drama Queen

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: Andrea busts a pothouse. Shelunda meets an intoxicated, beligerant woman in serious need of a restroom. Erika administers a dose of common sense to a woman. A suspect spots hidden surveillance equipment during Julie's undercover prostitution sting.

12.title: These Are Somebody Else's Pants

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: Andrea prevents a suspected crack-dealer from fleeing the takedown scene. Shelunda goes on a scavenger hunt throughout an apartment complex. Erika joins a high-speed chase when a suspicious car refuses to stop. Julie plays house with fellow detectives.

13.title: This Too Shall Pass

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: A barber student tries to sell marijuana on Andrea's watch. Shelunda arrests a pregnant 16-year-old runaway. Erika nabs a guy wanted for stealing a car. Julie is on the case when a hotel maintenance man is allegedly spit in the face and stabbed.

1.title: Hell of a Cop

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: The four tough-talking Police Women of Broward County battle crime as Andrea tackles a drug dealer twice her size, Ana outsmarts a stripper with some drugs to hide, Julie goes undercover as a prostitute and Shelunda investigates a bloody fight.

2.title: That Wasn't Me Running!

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Four Policewomen battle crime. Andrea has a canine help sniff out evidence; Ana outruns a sprinting criminal; Julie gets to the bottom of an alleged rape; and Shelunda answers a call where a woman my have driven herself drunk to the police station.

3.title: Another One Bites the Dust

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Deb takes part in a high-speed chase that ends in the tasing of a naked man; Lindsey arrests a man smuggling a van full of illegal immigrants; Amie busts a big time drug dealer; Kelly checks on an older woman in possible jeopardy.

4.title: I Hope Somebody Runs...

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: The Police Women of Broward County continue their battle against crime. Andrea collars two burglary suspects; Ana joins SWAT in bringing down a drug house; Julie confronts a rape victim with an unlikely suspect; Shelunda answers a possible suicide call.

5.title: Super Hot Blonde

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Andrea goes undercover to buy crack; Julie arrests men paying for sex using an internet escort service; Ana gives a suspect 32 seconds to tell her the truth; and Shelunda stops a child kidnapping in progress.

6.title: Don't Call Me Baby

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Arica responds to a man stabbed by his girlfriend; Aubrey calls in a search warrant to get her man; Joy helps a postman who's been bitten by a dog; and Virginia acts quickly to keep an angry crowd under control.

7.title: Welcome to the Real World

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Andrea shuts down a drug dealer operating out of an apartment; Julie tracks a sex-offender who has violated parole; Ana helps takedown a violent gang member; and Shelunda takes on a woman whose smell is far, far worse than her bite.

8.title: Let's Get the Next Customer

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Virginia chases down an armed suspect; Aubrey counsels a bloodied and broken-hearted young man; Joy gets a truant teenage girl to go to school; Arica goes beyond the call of duty and retrieves a detainee's gold teeth for him.

9.title: Strip Search Me!

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Andrea arrives at a drug deal with a woman dressed as a bunny; Julie goes undercover to nab prostitutes soliciting clients online; Ana finds dangerous evidence-a fully loaded pistol; and Shelunda arrests a drunk driver who claims he has a gun.

10.title: Are You Kidding Me?

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: While doing surveillance on a drug deal, Andrea busts the buyer and the seller; Julie has a car chase with a rape suspect; Ana's team shuts down a known drug house; Shelunda mediates a dispute that has escalated into violence.

11.title: Top 10 Takedowns

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: On this special episode of "Police Women of Maricopa County" we count down the season's top ten takedowns.

3.title: Nothin' But Whitey Tightys

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Virginia breaks up a neighborhood brawl; Aubrey gets called to a shooting and makes a horrible discovery; Joy gives two suspects a creative punishment; and Arica is the object of affection for a quirky underwear-clad suspect.

4.title: Pills Poppin' Everywhere

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Aubrey runs down a pair of men suspected of street gambling; Joy mediates a feud between an aunt and her niece over a washing machine; Virginia detains a suspected drug dealer; Arica encounters a bloody crime scene after a husband and wife domestic fight.

5.title: As Long As You Love Me

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Aubrey outruns a group of teenagers who try to flee from the police; Joy detains an man with a child support warrant; Arica is the unwanted recipient of a suspect's professed love; and Virginia apprehends a perp for violating an order of protection.

10.title: That Mace Is No Fun

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: Arica stops a man from driving when she finds out his license has been suspended fifty-two times; Virginia responds to shots fired; Aubrey pacifies a disgruntled neighbor; and Joy witnesses a comical display when a driver tries to move her damaged car.

2.title: I'm Putting Everybody in Cuffs

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Tracy finds herself alone in the middle of an all out neighborhood brawl. Melissa chases down a man accused of choking his girlfriend. Mia & Sara give a life lesson to an at-risk youth. Beth narrowly dodges a collision with a suspicious driver.

3.title: Kick Me Again, See What Happens

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Tracy takes down a belligerent drunk woman; Mia and Sara get a mouthful from a man with warrants; Melissa races to a disturbance involving a man with a loaded rifle; Beth tries to scare a young prostitute straight.

4.title: He Bleedin'

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Tracy arrests a man for allegedly attempting to stab his stepbrother; Mia and Sara break up a drunken fight between two women; Melissa discovers a stolen car at a suspected "chop shop".

5.title: A Fool for Love

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Tracy responds to a drug deal gone bad, leaving a street full of bullet casings and two men shot. Mia and Sara arrest a Casanova. Melissa stops a young woman for taking a stroll without a shirt. Beth's pursuit of burglary suspects takes serious turn.

6.title: This Ain't Pretty Woman

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Melissa kicks down a door while responding to a shots fired call; Tracy rolls up on a group of street gamblers and recognizes a familiar face; Mia and Sara take down a burglary suspect; Beth cuffs a suspicious character wanted on a warrant for assault.

7.title: Pull Up Your Pants

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Mia and Sara find a suspect that has hidden drugs in a disturbing place; Melissa responds to a man claiming his knife-wielding cousin is threatening him; Beth finds a man preparing to shoot heroin; Tracy busts a youth whose foolishness may cost him.

4.title: The Party's Over

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Mandy helps a single mother after her ex-boyfriend allegedly shows up to her apartment with a gun; Colleen helps bust a drug dealer who has set up shop in a local park; Rose chases down a man accused of stealing; Tia consoles a sobbing teen.

5.title: I'm Worth More Than Fifteen Bucks

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Colleen provides armed cover for U.S. Marshals; Mandy responds to a complaint about a belligerent loiterer; Rose surprises a man as he tries to leave the scene of a break-in; and Tia races to the scene when a woman is allegedly stabbed in the neck.

7.title: Good Girl in a Bad World

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: A suspected drunk driver gets a rude awakening when Mandy finds him passed out; Tia races into action when a child calls to report a shooting; Colleen's patience is tested when she nabs a prostitute; Rose helps a fast food clerk who feels threatened.

8.title: Aim and Fire

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Colleen uses a confidential informant to buy crack, but things take a turn for the unexpected; Mandy responds to a trespassing call; Tia races to the scene of an accused murderer, barricaded; Rose responds to drunken man harassing a group of college kids.

-1.title: You Can't Karate Chop a Car

episode of.title: Police Women of Broward County (TV Series 2009– )

-1.plot: Erika must draw her taser and chase down a man suspected of starting fires. Andrea finds a human trafficking victim at the heart of an immigration sting. Julie stops a reckless bicyclist and teaches him to yield.Shelunda assists in an undercover buy bust.

imdb.plot outline: Watch the fast-paced action surrounding four female deputies at the Broward County Sheriff's Office. Viewers are taken inside the real-life drama of women in law enforcement as they juggle their personal lives with demanding and often dangerous jobs. From robberies to homicides, drug busts to domestic violence, these fearless women put their lives on the line to keep the streets safe.
imdb.title: Police Women of Broward County
